summary.para: The FILTER_INFO structure contains information about a filter.

remarks.para: If the pGraph member is not NULL, the application should release the interface when it is finished using it.

summary.para: Null-terminated string containing the name of the filter.
If the filter is member of a filter graph, contains a pointer to the filter graph's interface. If the filter is not a member of a filter graph, this value of this member is NULL.
